about_the_game:
Fast-paced. Roguelike. Boss Rush. A unique experience!

Void Rush is a game that tests your skill besides your ability to create strategies. Drawing inspiration from fast-paced modern roguelikes and boss rush games, Void Rush offers an arcade-style experience that offers quick, uninterrupted sessions of intense action where you create a strategy, and jump into powerful boss-beating action. Improvise against the bosses' behavior, adapt to them, and overcome them by punishing the souls of your enemies in this action-packed challenging action game.

Gameplay & Features

The features specified below will take place in the release version of the game.
  • Powerful bosses with varying attack patterns.
  • Procedurally generated runs.
  • Strategic options to customize your build.
  • Various playable characters.
  • A magical, fantastic atmosphere.
  • Many difficulty modifiers to test your skills.
  • A short story with fun character interactions.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain weapons, fights, blood, killing, cursing, or crude language in certain scenes.

Void Rush is a game that tests your skill besides your ability to create strategies. Drawing inspiration from fast-paced modern roguelikes and boss rush games, Void Rush offers an arcade-style experience that offers quick, uninterrupted sessions of intense action where you create a strategy, and jump into powerful boss-beating action. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.04
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: An overclocked potato is more than enough.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Technology from outer worlds.

name: Void Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Technology from outer worlds.

short_description: Void Rush is a fast-paced action roguelike boss rush game in a magical, fantastic setting. Trapped within a dark void, you face relentless bosses with unearthly powers. Escape may seem possible, but why seek freedom when you can conquer the souls of your enemies time and time again?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Thai
*languages with full audio support
